edu.cuny.util
Interface Distribution

All Known Implementing Classes:
CumulativeDistribution, HeavyweightDistribution
public interface Distribution

Defines the operations on the distribution of samples of some random variable.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
Steve Phelps
